'''Zhu Ming''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Papilio Charontis Chapter]], Act I: ''[[Yet the Butterfly Flutters Away]]''. He can be found inside the Story Domain [[Enter the "border"]]. As a newcomer, he is impressed with how astonishing the place looks.
